author: Staff Reporter
text:
Madurai district police have arrested an 18-year-old youth from Valnaickenpatti for alleged sexual misbehaviour with a 14-year-old girl.

According to the complaint filed at Tirumangalam All Women Police Station on Monday, the youth, misbehaved with the girl, who is his neighbour, when she was alone at home two days back.

A case was registered under the Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO) Act and under Section 354B of the IPC.
title: Youth arrested under POCSO Act
